name: Dragonic Utopia Ray
text:
3 Level 5 monsters
(This card's name is always treated as "Number C39: Utopia Ray".)
Once per turn, when this card is targeted for an attack or by a card effect (Quick Effect): You can equip 1 "ZW -" monster from your hand or Deck to this card, as if it were equipped by its own effect. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target face-up cards your opponent controls up to the number of "ZW -" Monster Cards equipped to this card; negate their effects.
